Class BudgetReminder

java.lang.Object
models.BudgetReminder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IReminder
public class BudgetReminder extends Object implements IReminder
Represents a budget reminder in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system. Implements the IReminder interface and is linked to a Budget object.
See Also:
